messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheri:%ï¿½ MCayj^j<.3-BZZZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Lights have gone out due to electrical storm, station left dark</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Possible threat of hivebots on the station, keep cautious and keep a weapon with you</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Drug store open near medbay, either your best friend or your worst enemy</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">People starting to call for the shuttle, will it get called or not? Who knows the bridge is on lockdown and seems that it will not open again</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
COMMS DOWN
What could this mean for the future of the station?
Danger of course!

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
Job offer:
Writers wanted for the library, mostly wanted for fiction but other genres are welcome
